attributes.action: Put in place a law that over 6 year olds and Teachers at school wear masks.
attributes.additional_details: Here in Italy children over 6 years old wear masks and as a Mother I can tell you it has been successful in keeping Covid 19 from spreading.
attributes.background: Make a law of children over the age of 6 years and teachers to wear surgical masks in school throughout the day, to help stop the spread and keep the Education system from breaking down. Education is important.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551102
